basic.description: Through a variety of readings and written and oral activities, this course provides students with knowledge about modern Spanish America, from 1800 to the present. Topics may include indigenous and Afro-Caribbean cultures, multiculturalism, revolutions, globalization, and border issues.
basic.subject: SPW
basic.title: Readings from Modern Spanish America

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: SPW 330 and SPN 3400; or SPN 3350.
